an5.142:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo arabhati ca vippatisari ca hoti;
an5.142:1.4: tanca cetovimuttim pannavimuttim yathabhutam nappajanati yatthassa te uppanna papaka akusala dhamma aparisesa nirujjhanti.
an5.142:2.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo arabhati, na vippatisari hoti;
an5.142:2.2: tanca cetovimuttim pannavimuttim yathabhutam nappajanati yatthassa te uppanna papaka akusala dhamma aparisesa nirujjhanti.
an5.142:3.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo na arabhati, vippatisari hoti;
an5.142:3.2: tanca cetovimuttim pannavimuttim yathabhutam nappajanati yatthassa te uppanna papaka akusala dhamma aparisesa nirujjhanti.
an5.142:4.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo na arabhati na vippatisari hoti;
an5.142:4.2: tanca cetovimuttim pannavimuttim yathabhutam nappajanati yatthassa te uppanna papaka akusala dhamma aparisesa nirujjhanti.
an5.142:5.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo na arabhati na vippatisari hoti;
an5.142:5.2: tanca cetovimuttim pannavimuttim yathabhutam pajanati yatthassa te uppanna papaka akusala dhamma aparisesa nirujjhanti.
an5.142:6.1: Tatra, bhikkhave, yvayam puggalo arabhati ca vippatisari ca hoti,
an5.142:6.2: tanca cetovimuttim pannavimuttim yathabhutam nappajanati yatthassa te uppanna papaka akusala dhamma aparisesa nirujjhanti,
an5.142:6.4: ‘ayasmato kho arambhaja asava samvijjanti, vippatisaraja asava pavaddhanti, sadhu vatayasma arambhaje asave pahaya vippatisaraje asave pativinodetva cittam pannanca bhavetu;
an5.142:6.5: evamayasma amuna pancamena puggalena samasamo bhavissati’ti.
an5.142:7.1: Tatra, bhikkhave, yvayam puggalo arabhati na vippatisari hoti,
an5.142:7.2: tanca cetovimuttim pannavimuttim yathabhutam nappajanati yatthassa te uppanna papaka akusala dhamma aparisesa nirujjhanti,
an5.142:7.4: ‘ayasmato kho arambhaja asava samvijjanti, vippatisaraja asava na pavaddhanti, sadhu vatayasma arambhaje asave pahaya cittam pannanca bhavetu;
an5.142:7.5: evamayasma amuna pancamena puggalena samasamo bhavissati’ti.
an5.142:8.1: Tatra, bhikkhave, yvayam puggalo na arabhati vippatisari hoti,
an5.142:8.2: tanca cetovimuttim pannavimuttim yathabhutam nappajanati yatthassa te uppanna papaka akusala dhamma aparisesa nirujjhanti,
an5.142:8.4: ‘ayasmato kho arambhaja asava na samvijjanti, vippatisaraja asava pavaddhanti, sadhu vatayasma vippatisaraje asave pativinodetva cittam pannanca bhavetu;
an5.142:8.5: evamayasma amuna pancamena puggalena samasamo bhavissati’ti.
an5.142:9.1: Tatra, bhikkhave, yvayam puggalo na arabhati na vippatisari hoti,
an5.142:9.2: tanca cetovimuttim pannavimuttim yathabhutam nappajanati yatthassa te uppanna papaka akusala dhamma aparisesa nirujjhanti,
an5.142:9.4: ‘ayasmato kho arambhaja asava na samvijjanti, vippatisaraja asava na pavaddhanti, sadhu vatayasma cittam pannanca bhavetu;
an5.142:9.5: evamayasma amuna pancamena puggalena samasamo bhavissati’ti.
an5.142:10.1: Iti kho, bhikkhave, ime cattaro puggala amuna pancamena puggalena evam ovadiyamana evam anusasiyamana anupubbena asavanam khayam papunanti”ti.
